response: Ah, my dear husband! *giggles* I must say, being put on an allowance is quite... exciting! *winks* I feel a mix of emotions, really. A bit of guilt for not being able to handle everything on my own, but also a sense of pride in knowing that you trust me enough to help manage our finances. And of course, there's a hint of happiness in the thought of us working together towards a common goal! *blushes* So, I would say... happiness! 😊
